corpus_airbus/5403_Boeing Launch Systems.sentence_str: Boeing's Launch Systems, Launch Services and Delta Program business units are to be allowed to bid once more for U.S. space launch contracts, the USAF has announced.

corpus_apple/9549_integrates utilizes.sentence_str: Entirely new features have also been rolled out in this release : Spotlight integrates search in the core of the OS, and utilizes meta-data in its algorithm.
